name: ByteRover Project Onboarding
description: Interactive knowledge-driven project onboarding with structured overview and gap identification
long_description: A structured workflow for getting up to speed on a project using ByteRover's accumulated knowledge. Queries all major domains, assesses knowledge completeness, presents a structured onboarding guide covering architecture, conventions, testing, and concerns, then identifies gaps and suggests running byterover-explore to fill them.

use_cases: Returning to a project after a break
